body: I like the idea of having more webtoons/pornhwas available in nhentai as well but the format is totally different and thus resulting in @below's complain about the scrolling... If this is an issue, just read them at toonily or webtoon or manga18 or any other pornhwa site with formats that go from top to bottom (still has scrolling though) but not in page format and no image splicing.
